HOW IT WORKS
Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. The fine print: a HIDDEN-CITY flight is a flight where you get off at the layover rather than the final destination. For example, a flight from New York to San Francisco might be $300, but a similar flight from New York to Seattle with a layover in San Francisco might be $200. If you’re going to San Francisco we’ll show you both flights, and if you choose the cheaper one, you get off the plane at the layover (San Francisco) rather than going to the final destination (Seattle).

This is perfectly legal and the savings can be significant, but if you’ve never traveled like this before, you should read our HIDDEN-CITY FAQ at http://skiplagged.com/faq

The most-used e-scooter sharing app in Europe. Travel quickly whenever you want through the city on an electric shared scooter. Find a felyx e-scooter in your neighbourhood, book it and activate it through the app and off you go!  
 

Felyx e-scooter sharing is now available in more than 10 cities in The Netherlands, Belgium and Germany, like Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague, Groningen, Brussels, Berlin, Hamburg and many more! 

The benefits of the felyx e-scooter app: 

• Reserving: snag it. You can book an e-scooter for free for up to 10 minutes, after which you pay €0.15 per extended minute.  

•  Smart radar function: get a notification when a shared scooter becomes free in your area. 

•  Earn free riding minutes: invite your friends and receive 15 free minutes of riding per registered friend.  

•  Parking mode: would you like to park the felyx e-scooter for a while, but not run the risk of someone else renting it? Use the parking mode and keep the shared scooter for €0.10/min (NL) or €0,13 p/m (DE) and €0.15 p/m (BE). 

•  Smartphone charger: charge your smartphone while you ride. Use the USB port and your own USB cable as soon as the e-scooter is activated.  

•  Battery status: overview of the battery capacity of each e-scooter before you book. 

How does the felyx e-scooter sharing app work? 

1. Register in just a few minutes 

Simply register with the practical driver's license verification system in the app. Add your payment information and you're ready to ride.  

2. Finding & renting 

Use the app to find a felyx scooter near you and make a reservation at the push of a button. 

3. Activate & off you go! 

Activate the e-scooter in the app and ride anywhere within the service area quickly and carefree. We make sure batteries are full and maintenance is taken care of. 

4. Parking & locking 

Arrived safe? Park properly in the service area and end the rental via the app. No-hassle payment, minutes ridden are automatically debited from your bank account.  


Frequently asked questions about felyx e-scooter sharing: 
What do you do regarding the hygiene of a felyx e-scooter? 
Both e-scooters and helmets are cleaned and disinfected on a daily basis. All e-scooters capable of going 45 km/h are equipped with helmets and hairnets.  

I don't live in a city with felyx, can I hire an e-scooter? 
Yes, you can! Registering is quick and easy. Just choose the city you are planning to make your first ride 

What does felyx cost? 
With felyx, you only pay for what you use. In the Netherlands and Belgium, you pay from €0.25/min and in Germany you’re paying from €0.18/min 

At the moment, you don't pay any registration fee, but we do charge unlock fee of €0.50 per ride. 

Do I need a driver's license and if so, what type? 
Class B (which also allows you to drive a car), class A or a moped license (class AM). 

Can I drive and park outside a service area? 
You can drive the felyx e-scooter outside the green marked areas in the app. However, activating and ending the rental is only possible within those green areas. It is possible to use the parking mode outside the service area at €0.10 p/m (NL), €0,13 p/m (DE) and €0.15 p/m (BE). The service area for a given city can be found on our website and on the map in the app. Make sure you park the felyx e-scooter properly: do not block the pavement for pedestrians, wheelchairs and prams. 
 
About felyx e-scooter sharing 
We are a Dutch scale-up with ambitious plans for sustainable suburban transport. Want to know more about us? Do you have suggestions or ideas? Send us an e-mail (klantenservice@felyx.nl) or visit our website.

Buy one of our prepaid eSIM plans at affordable rates (starting from $4.50) in over 190+ countries and regions to enjoy global connectivity!
Add a data pack to your dual SIM iPhone or iPad and stop worrying about staying connected while on your adventures.

Say 'alo' to freedom!

What is an eSIM?
* An eSIM is embedded SIM technology. Think of it as a digital SIM card. Rather than requiring users to fiddle with SIM trays and pins, the eSIM operates within your device's firmware.

.

What is an eSIM data plan?
* An eSIM data plan is a prepaid data-only plan that you can install directly to your eSIM compatible device. Think of it as a lightweight prepaid plan or virtual data SIM. The advantage is that you no longer need a fiddly, easily lost old-school plastic SIM card that you can easily lose in your pockets. eSIMs are a true technological revolution and we bring them right into your eSIM-compatible device!
* You get access to local data services at affordable prices without the need to hunt down a physical SIM card, WiFi or paying for expensive roaming.
* You can continue to use your existing phone number while using the data from your eSIM.


Does an eSIM come with a number?
